description: Dispatched when a body part is dismembered by damage exceeding the dismemberment threshold. Fires before other damage type effects (bleed, burn, poison) are applied.

entityId.description: Entity ID of the character experiencing dismemberment

entityName.description: Display name of the entity (for UI rendering)

entityPronoun.description: Pronoun for the entity (for narrative text)

partId.description: Entity ID of the dismembered body part

damageTypeId.description: Type of damage that caused the dismemberment (e.g., 'slashing', 'crushing')
